channel.title: Need how on flipping portal (global object)
channel.description: title says all, i want the portal to face the fence, can anyone help? heres a screenie of what it looks like now http://prntscr.com/c7pl6

item.title: Need how on flipping portal (global object)
item.dc:creator: @DevinCooley DevinCooley
item.description:
@DevinCooley wrote:


That is how you would spawn an object. Where it says 1, 10 at the end, the 1 is the side the object is facing. there is -1, 0, 1, and 2. Keep playing with those numbers until it faces where you want it to face.

hope this helped!
